name: 组合数学
complexity: O(n^2) for naive combination computation, O(n) with precomputed factorials and modular inverses
scenarios: Counting problems, probability, binomial expansions, combinatorial identities, inclusion-exclusion, stars and bars, permutations with repetitions, circular permutations
extensions: Multinomial theorem, generating functions, combinatorial number theory, combinatorial optimization, combinatorial designs
